try this

if (objectID == 4493) { teleportToX = 3433; teleportToY = 3537; sendMessage("you climb up the stairs'"); break; }

that might work

item.title: Damned Slayer Tower
item.dc:creator: @Tyranny Tyranny
item.description:
@Tyranny wrote:

Hey guys, i’m having a few problems with a source regarding the slayer tower.
Source used: Reapagescape v2

Basically what i’m trying to do is to make the Stairs and the Chain go up to the second level of the tower, however every time i try and use either, they put me 1 level up but theres no floor or anything up there, and glitches my Character (unless i force restart the server).
This is something i’ve seen before many many times but i haven’t had the slightest clue on how to fix it.
Anyways, here are the cases for the Stairs and the Chain.

case 4493: heightLevel = 1; teleportToX = 3433; teleportToY = 3537; break;

And

case 9319: heightLevel += 1; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; break;

If anyone could help me out with solving this problem, it would be much appreciated, thanks everyone.

Read full topic
